about_the_game:
Fatima 2 is here with more angelic, otherwordly, modern and futuristic music for your gaming needs! Featuring well-produced techno-hybrid music with a unique futuristic vision, unique sound design and effects make this music pack stand out amongst the crowd.

Features:

* 20 royalty-free music tracks
* .ogg, .wav, .mp3 and .m4a formats included
* For use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

01_Angel
02_Nerve Connection
03_Negative Mass
04_Humanity
05_Killing Weapon
06_FATIMA EVE
07_ATHENA
08_Mental Pollution
09_Flash Back
10_Non Human
11_Judgement
12_Strange Room
13_Primordial Memory
14_Void
15_Dimension Gap
16_Death Concept
17_Breath
18_Disappeared
19_エンドロール
20_Whereabouts of Heart

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
